item.title: Develop Jira plugin with forge
item.description: Judge a man by his questions rather than by his answers Judge a man by his questions rather than by his answers. â€” Voltaire1 Introduction. Link to heading Jira Software allows teams to plan, assign, track, and manage work more easily. Born in 2002 initially for bug and ticket monitoring only, it is written in Java, and the name is a truncation of Gojira, Japanese transliteration of Godzilla In this article, we will create an application with the Forge development platform, for collecting and sending data to an external server, via a REST call.

item.title: About
